languages.text: "Один хороший человек выходил меня и помог встать на ноги. Он ничего не взял взамен, лишь попросил вернуть добро другому".
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."
languages.original_text: "Один хороший человек выходил меня и помог встать на ноги. Он ничего не взял взамен, лишь попросил вернуть добро другому".

traits.locale_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return, only asked to give that same kindness to somebody else."
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return, only asked to give that same kindness to somebody else."
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."
"A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

languages.text: «Una buena persona cuidó de mí y me ayudó a volver a levantarme. Tampoco pidió nada a cambio, tan solo que les mostrara esa misma amabilidad a otros».
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

traits.locale_text: «Una buena persona cuidó de mí y me ayudó a volver a levantarme. Tampoco pidió nada a cambio, tan solo que les mostrara esa misma amabilidad a otros».

languages.text: 「とある人が私の面倒を見てくれて、立ち上がるのを手伝ってくれた。その人は見返りを求めなかった。他の人に優しくするようにとだけ言っていた」
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

traits.locale_text: 「とある人が私の面倒を見てくれて、立ち上がるのを手伝ってくれた。その人は見返りを求めなかった。他の人に優しくするようにとだけ言っていた」

languages.text: “因为以前也有个好人照顾过我，帮助我重新站了起来。那个人没有索取任何回报，只是要求我也对其他人表现出同样的善意。”
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

traits.locale_text: “因为以前也有个好人照顾过我，帮助我重新站了起来。那个人没有索取任何回报，只是要求我也对其他人表现出同样的善意。”

languages.text: "Eine gute Person hat sich um mich gekümmert und mir wieder auf die Beine geholfen. Sie hat dafür auch nichts verlangt. Sie wollte nur, dass ich jemand anderem die gleiche Güte zukommen lasse."
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

traits.locale_text: "Eine gute Person hat sich um mich gekümmert und mir wieder auf die Beine geholfen. Sie hat dafür auch nichts verlangt. Sie wollte nur, dass ich jemand anderem die gleiche Güte zukommen lasse."

languages.text: « Une bonne âme a pris soin de moi et m'a tendu la main pour que je me relève. Le tout sans rien exiger en échange, si ce n'est la promesse que je viendrai en aide à mon tour à quelqu'un d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."

traits.locale_text: « Une bonne âme a pris soin de moi et m'a tendu la main pour que je me relève. Le tout sans rien exiger en échange, si ce n'est la promesse que je viendrai en aide à mon tour à quelqu'un d'autre. »

languages.text: "Bir vakitler iyi bir insan bana göz kulak olup ayağa kalkmama yardım etmişti. Karşılığında hiçbir şey de almamıştı. Benden yalnızca aynı iyiliği başkalarına da göstermemi istemişti."
languages.original_text: "A good person took care of me and helped me to stand again. They didn't take anything in return either. They just asked me to show that same kindness to somebody else."
